text: وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِيُعَذِّبَهُمۡ وَأَنتَ فِيهِمۡۚ وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ مُعَذِّبَهُمۡ وَهُمۡ يَسۡتَغۡفِرُونَ

translation.en: But Allah would not punish them while you, [O Muhammad], are among them, and Allah would not punish them while they seek forgiveness
translation.id: Tetapi Allah tidak akan menghukum mereka, selama engkau (Muhammad) berada di antara mereka. Dan tidaklah (pula) Allah akan menghukum mereka, sedang mereka (masih) memohon ampunan
